title: Flexible
text: You can pick your favorite framework (Vue, Angular, Ember) or templating engine (React, Preact, hyperHTML, Âµhtml, Svelte, vanila).

title: Usable
text: Merkur widgets work with a multi-page application built with jQuery or a single-page application, as well as an isomorphic application.

title: SSR-ready
text: Website load time is a critical usability factor for your users. Merkur speeds up loading by including server-side rendering out of the box.

title: Extensible
text: All base functionality is defined as plugins, and adding your own is a matter of creating a single file.

title: Configurable
text: You have control over Babel, Webpack, server, etc.

title: Tiny
text: Merkur is less than 1 KB minified + gzipped.
